text: Ɛnyε bͻne mma (mmaa no) sε (wͻ’nngu akatatire wͻ) wͻn papa anim, anaa wͻn mma mmarima anim, anaa wͻn nua mmarima nom anim anaa wͻn nua mmarima mma mmarima anim, anaa wͻn nua mmaa mma mmarima anim, anaa wͻn ara mmaa anim, anaa wͻn mfenaa anim, na monsuro Nyankopͻn. Nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn di biribiara ho adanseε
